message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200.
I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $175?
I understand your budget constraint, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer the product to you for $190. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $190 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $165?

I'm still willing to work with you, Bob. I can offer the product to you for $185. It's a great value, and I think you'll really enjoy it. I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm willing to meet you halfway again.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway again, but $185 is still a bit too high for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $155?

I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can offer the product to you for $160. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product. I'm willing to make one more compromise to meet you halfway.
